originalText.text: Dr. Gribitz is an extraordinary clinician. She is empathetic, highly intelligent,  personable and very responsive. Her office is immaculate, well-organized and conveniently located on the Upper East Side of Manhattan. I am pleased to provide my highest  recommendation.

text.text: Dr. Gribitz is an extraordinary clinician. She is empathetic, highly intelligent,  personable and very responsive. Her office is immaculate, well-organized and conveniently located on the Upper East Side of Manhattan. I am pleased to provide my highest  recommendation.

originalText.text: I have been seeing Dr. Gribetz for over 10 years and cannot say enough good things about her. She is a brilliant diagnostician, is steady and precise with procedures, is an artist when it comes to cosmetic work and has a bedside manner that makes everyone feel comfortable.  She has treated my whole family (including my children since they were babies) for a wide range of dermatological issues and never fails to impress me.

text.text: I have been seeing Dr. Gribetz for over 10 years and cannot say enough good things about her. She is a brilliant diagnostician, is steady and precise with procedures, is an artist when it comes to cosmetic work and has a bedside manner that makes everyone feel comfortable.  She has treated my whole family (including my children since they were babies) for a wide range of dermatological issues and never fails to impress me.

originalText.text: Dr. Gribetz is very professional and listens to her patients’ concerns. She is very knowledgeable and has successfully addressed all my skin issues. She was great with my children as well. I would highly recommend her!

text.text: Dr. Gribetz is very professional and listens to her patients’ concerns. She is very knowledgeable and has successfully addressed all my skin issues. She was great with my children as well. I would highly recommend her!

originalText.text: Dr. Gribetz is a meticulous dermatologist with an exceptional bedside manner. In addition to me, she has also treated my children with warmth, patience and the best results. She answers every question in a clear, accessible manner and ensures that everyone feels comfortable before and after procedures. Her staff members are also very professional and responsive.

text.text: Dr. Gribetz is a meticulous dermatologist with an exceptional bedside manner. In addition to me, she has also treated my children with warmth, patience and the best results. She answers every question in a clear, accessible manner and ensures that everyone feels comfortable before and after procedures. Her staff members are also very professional and responsive.

originalText.text: Dr. Gribetz is the best dermatologist!  She is extremely patient, thorough, and a great diagnostician.  She is terrific with kids and adults.  I love coming to her office and interacting with both her and her staff.  She is easy to reach in an emergency and always makes time for her patients.

I love coming to her office and interacting with both her and her staff.  She is easy to reach in an emergency and always makes time for her patients.
